## Random.float() method

Generates a uniformly-distributed floating-point number between `min` (inclusive) and `max` (exclusive).

**Signature:**

```typescript
float(min: number, max: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  min | number | The generated number will be at least this value. |
|  max | number | The generated number will be less than this value. |

**Returns:**

number
